patterns: When was Nasha MUKT Bharat Abhiyan launched?
How many district are the part of Nasha Mukti Bharat Abhiyaan?
responses: Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment which is the Nodal Ministry for Drug Demand Reduction has formulated and launched Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan (NMBA) on 15th August 2020, in 272 Districts across 32 State/Union Territories identified as most vulnerable in terms of usage of drugs in the country.

patterns: Which three departments are involved in the Nasha Mukt Bharat Abhiyaan?
responses: Narcotics Control Bureau, Outreach and Awareness and Demand Reduction effort by Social Justice and Empowerment and treatment through Health Department.
